column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was the first time my wife an I had deep dish pizza.  We decided to go with the Classic pizza
column2: because if it's their classic it must be good
column4: it was and we were not disappointed.  We ordered the medium
column6: but it was too much for us.  No problem
column7: it just meant we had some leftovers to hobble on later.
